mapper.select: SELECT a.model_seq , a.model_nm , a.device_type , fnc_get_code_nm(a.device_type) as deviceTypeNm , a.vendor_seq , v.vendor_nm , a.reg_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as reg_dt , a.update_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as update_dt FROM GND_DEVICE_MODEL a LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_VENDOR_INFO v ON (a.vendor_seq = v.vendor_seq)
SELECT count(*) as co FROM GND_DEVICE_MODEL a

SELECT a.model_seq , a.model_nm , a.device_type , fnc_get_code_nm(a.device_type) as deviceTypeNm , a.vendor_seq , v.vendor_nm , a.reg_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as reg_dt , a.update_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as update_dt FROM GND_DEVICE_MODEL a LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_VENDOR_INFO v ON (a.vendor_seq = v.vendor_seq) WHERE model_seq = #{modelSeq}
